Smart Bottle: A water bottle with a built-in temperature sensor and a digital display that shows the current temperature of the water inside. This can help people monitor their water intake and ensure they are staying hydrated at the right temperature.

Self-Cleaning Bottle: A water bottle with a self-cleaning mechanism that uses UV light or ultrasonic technology to kill bacteria and other microorganisms that can accumulate in water bottles. This can help people avoid getting sick from contaminated water.

Bottle with Built-in Filter: A water bottle with a built-in filter that removes impurities and contaminants from tap water. This can help people access clean drinking water on the go, without having to rely on single-use plastic bottles.

Bottle with Voice Recognition: A water bottle with voice recognition technology that allows people to control the temperature and other settings of the bottle using voice commands. This can be particularly useful for people with disabilities or those who are unable to use traditional buttons or controls.

Bottle with LED Lights: A water bottle with LED lights that can be customized to different colors and patterns. This can help people stay motivated and engaged with their water intake, and can also be a fun and creative way to personalize their bottle.
